title: Constantine’s Secret
description: Librarian Note: See Alternate Cover Edition HERE.How long can you keep a secret? What if it’s one that changes your life forever? Could you live with yourself if this secret has the potential to hurt the people closest to you?Constantine has a secret just like this one. A secret she never imagined would befall her and one she’s fighting hard to keep hidden forever.But can she?All secrets eventually come out… or do you bury them with more lies and more secrets?Constantine lives with her parents in a remote fishermen’s village on the Italian coast and has become fairly content with her life. Until her father forces her into an arranged marriage.But her life changes forever with the impromptu meeting of a complete stranger with a hidden past and his own secrets to bear. Although a standalone novel, the Author recommends reading its prequel, Little Darling first. Both books are suitable for Young Adult and Teens
author: Urcelia Teixeira
